Trainer Rank
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): FAQ: The Most Important Game Data: Trainer Rank
By Strunks on Friday, September 14, 2001 - 10:53 am:

You start MR2 off as Trainer Rank 1.
To get to the next Trainer Rank, you must beat an official tournament.

Trainer Rank 2 = D Tourney
Trainer Rank 3 = C Tourney
Trainer Rank 4 = B Tourney
Trainer Rank 5 = A Tourney
Trainer Rank 6 = S Tourney
Trainer Rank 7 = Beat any Major-4 battle
Trainer Rank 8 = Beat another M-4 battle
Trainer Rank 9 = Beat another M-4 battle
MASTER Rank = Beat the last tournament left out of the four

MASTER also allows you to open up Legend Cup
